sentences.en: Abandon to God is of more value than personal holiness.
sentences.cn: 向神降伏比追求个人的圣洁更有价值.

sentences.en: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.
sentences.cn: 7神召我们,本不是要我们沾染污秽, 乃是要我们成为圣洁.

sentences.en: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentences.cn: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心.

sentences.en: His Holiness has asked me to bring you along to my monthly audience.
sentences.cn: 所以他让我带你去参加我们母子每月一次的探望.

sentences.en: His Holiness Pope John Paul II
sentences.cn: 教皇圣座约翰∙保罗二世

sentences.en: Karan Thapar: The Chinese say one other thing, Your Holiness.
sentences.cn: 嘉瓦仁波切, 中国人说到另外一件事情.

sentences.en: My progress in holiness depends on God and myself.
sentences.cn: 我在圣洁上的前进都靠着上帝和我自己.

sentences.en: Pattern of sanctification . Holiness of divine nature Image of Christ.
sentences.cn: 成圣的样式﹕上帝圣洁的本性. 基督的样式.

sentences.en: The holiness of God reveals one's own sin.
sentences.cn: 上帝的神圣揭示世人自身的罪孽。

sentences.en: The President received His Holiness at the White House.
sentences.cn: 总统在白宫接见了教皇陛下。

sentences.en: The Root of Holiness : Co - crucifixion and Co - resurrection with Jesus Christ.
sentences.cn: 圣洁的根源﹕与耶稣基督同钉十字架﹐同复活.

sentences.en: They deemed the young clergyman a miracle of holiness.
sentences.cn: 他们一心认为这年轻的牧师是神圣的奇迹.

sentences.en: They worship dreams Holiness in art, ritual, entertainment.
sentences.cn: 他们崇拜梦,崇拜艺术 、 仪式和娱乐中的神圣.

sentences.en: We were immediately struck by this city's holiness.
sentences.cn: 我们立即就被这座城市的神圣氛围所打动。

sentences.en: You see, Holiness is to permeate all read of life.
sentences.cn: 你看 、 圣洁是要渗透我们生命的每一角落.

words.tran_cn: 圣洁的，神圣的；至善的；n. 神圣的东西；（俚）太棒了
神圣；圣座（大写，对教宗等的尊称）

trans.tran_cn: 神圣，（对罗马教皇的尊称）陛下，圣座
trans.tran_en: the quality of being pure and good in a religious way
